channel.title: Change Window'x Xp passwords
channel.description:
The topic in the tutorial section on changing passwords doesn't work for me. When I try the "net user" way it always says "Access Is Denied", and when I do the "control userpasswords2" it asks me for the administrator's password.
So is there any way that you can change passwords on windows?

item.title: Change Window'x Xp passwords
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

What about if it has a password?

I knew about that way before, but I wanted to see if there was anything else you can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Window'x Xp passwords
item.dc:creator: @MoO MoO
item.description:
@MoO wrote:

Load up in safe mode, Go under the account on there (usually doesnt have a password) and then go to control panel, accounts then you kno what to do

Also it doesnt ask you for the old passsword for password changing

Read full topic
